title: Thomas Stone National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery      Â                 1977 Fire Pictures   3 Photos            July Fun at Thomas Stone NHS   7 Photos  During July, the park opened a new exhibit with guest speakers, hosted an Independence Day celebration, and had a summer group earn the coveted Junior Ranger badge for Thomas Stone National Historic Site          Special Event Photos   6 Photos              NPS Centennial Media Quality   5 Photos  Photos of Thomas Stone NHS to be used for NPS Centennial publications.
